txt.en: Somewhere in the depths of Byrgenstow, the ruler of the draugar dwells
Searching for the source of the madness that has befallen the creatures of the marsh, you tracked the draugar to a cave in the W贸dfen.

Searching for the source of the madness that has befallen the creatures of the marsh, you tracked the draugar to a cave in the W贸dfen.\n\nYou should enter Byrgenstow and defeat the chieftain of the draugar.
The draug-chieftain probably dwells somewhere in the depths of their cave.\n\nYou should hunt for the draug-chieftain and put an end to its existence.

'There have always been dark legends about the W贸dfen, and your tale bears them out. I wonder why the Dead have awakened now?\n\n'It is no matter. You have done us a service by destroying their chieftain.'
The draug-chieftain probably dwells somewhere in the depths of their cave.\n\nYou should hunt for the draug-chieftain and put an end to its existence.
There are Rohirrim at Eaworth, south of the W贸dfen.\n\nYou should bring news of your victory against Henmaru to the Rohirrim.
